intro: Noccaea maassoumii, commonly known as the Maassoumii honesty, is a species of flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae. It is native to the mountainous regions of Iran and is characterized by its small, white flowers and hairy stems. The plant typically grows in rocky or gravelly soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. It has a low-growing habit with leaves that are alternate and pinnately divided. Noccaea maassoumii is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and ecological adaptations.
